title: A LASER MARKABLE RFID TAG
abstract: The invention is directed to a laser markable RFID tag comprising a RFID transponder and a laser markable layer and to an article or packaging comprising such a laser markable RFID tag.

objectives: Develop a laser markable RFID tag that combines RFID technology with laser markable capabilities.
methods: Integrate a RFID transponder with a laser markable layer to create the laser markable RFID tag.

motivations: There is a need for a RFID tag that can be marked using a laser.
objectives: Invent a laser markable RFID tag that comprises a RFID transponder and a laser markable layer.
methods: Incorporate a laser markable layer into the design of a RFID tag.
results: Creation of a RFID tag that can be marked using a laser.

motivations: There is a need for RFID tags that can be marked or customized using laser technology for identification and tracking purposes.
objectives: Develop a RFID tag that combines radio frequency identification capabilities with laser markable functionality.
methods: Integration of a RFID transponder with a laser markable layer to create a unified tag system.
results: Enable articles and packaging to have customizable RFID tags that can be marked with laser technology for enhanced identification and tracking.
